mapper.select:
select t1.id , t1.request_id , t1.request_no , t1.cur_status , t1.cur_bpmstate , t1.cur_user , t1.request_unit , t1.batch_no , t1.model_id , t1.request_date , t1.deal_id , t1.deal_name , t1.resp_id , t1.resp_no , t1.task_id , t1.task_no , t1.borrow_info_id , t1.card_archive_id , t1.task_archive_id , t1.has_outfiedcard , t1.has_oapublishsheet , t1.has_fax , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 from hdkf_support_process_view t1
and t1.ID like '%'||#{bean.id}||'%'
and t1.REQUEST_ID like '%'||#{bean.requestId}||'%'
and t1.REQUEST_NO like '%'||#{bean.requestNo}||'%'
and t1.CUR_STATUS like '%'||#{bean.curStatus}||'%'
and t1.CUR_BPMSTATE like '%'||#{bean.curBpmstate}||'%'
and t1.CUR_USER like '%'||#{bean.curUser}||'%'
and t1.REQUEST_UNIT like '%'||#{bean.requestUnit}||'%'
and t1.BATCH_NO like '%'||#{bean.batchNo}||'%'
and t1.MODEL_ID like '%'||#{bean.modelId}||'%'
and t1.REQUEST_DATE >= #{bean.requestDateBegin}
and t1.REQUEST_DATE <= #{bean.requestDateEnd}
and t1.DEAL_ID like '%'||#{bean.dealId}||'%'
and t1.DEAL_NAME like '%'||#{bean.dealName}||'%'
and t1.RESP_ID like '%'||#{bean.respId}||'%'
and t1.RESP_NO like '%'||#{bean.respNo}||'%'
and t1.TASK_ID like '%'||#{bean.taskId}||'%'
and t1.TASK_NO like '%'||#{bean.taskNo}||'%'
and t1.BORROW_INFO_ID like '%'||#{bean.borrowInfoId}||'%'
and t1.CARD_ARCHIVE_ID like '%'||#{bean.cardArchiveId}||'%'
and t1.TASK_ARCHIVE_ID like '%'||#{bean.taskArchiveId}||'%'
and t1.HAS_OUTFIEDCARD like '%'||#{bean.hasOutfiedcard}||'%'
and t1.HAS_OAPUBLISHSHEET like '%'||#{bean.hasOapublishsheet}||'%'
and t1.HAS_FAX like '%'||#{bean.hasFax}||'%'
and t1.CREATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.createdBy}||'%'
and t1.CREATION_DATE like '%'||#{bean.creationDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateIp}||'%'
and t1.VERSION like '%'||#{bean.version}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like '%'||#{bean.attribute01}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like '%'||#{bean.attribute02}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like '%'||#{bean.attribute03}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like '%'||#{bean.attribute04}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like '%'||#{bean.attribute05}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like '%'||#{bean.attribute06}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like '%'||#{bean.attribute07}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like '%'||#{bean.attribute08}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like '%'||#{bean.attribute09}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like '%'||#{bean.attribute10}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like '%'||#{bean.attribute11}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like '%'||#{bean.attribute12}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like '%'||#{bean.attribute13}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like '%'||#{bean.attribute14}||'%'
and ${sfnConditions.sql}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.request_id , t1.request_no , t1.cur_status , t1.cur_bpmstate , t1.cur_user , t1.request_unit , t1.batch_no , t1.model_id , t1.request_date , t1.deal_id , t1.deal_name , t1.resp_id , t1.resp_no , t1.task_id , t1.task_no , t1.borrow_info_id , t1.card_archive_id , t1.task_archive_id , t1.has_outfiedcard , t1.has_oapublishsheet , t1.has_fax , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 from hdkf_support_process_view t1 where t1.id = #{id}

id,
request_id,
request_no,
cur_status,
cur_bpmstate,
cur_user,
request_unit,
batch_no,

request_date,
deal_id,

attribute_05,
attribute_06,
attribute_07,
attribute_08,
attribute_09,
attribute_10,
attribute_11,
attribute_12,
attribute_13,
attribute_14,

update hdkf_support_process_view t1
t1.id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.request_id =#{requestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.request_no =#{requestNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.cur_status =#{curStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.cur_bpmstate =#{curBpmstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.cur_user =#{curUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.request_unit =#{requestUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.batch_no =#{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.model_id =#{modelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.request_date =#{requestDate,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.deal_id =#{dealId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.deal_name =#{dealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.resp_id =#{respId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.resp_no =#{respNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.task_id =#{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.task_no =#{taskNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.borrow_info_id =#{borrowInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.card_archive_id =#{cardArchiveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.task_archive_id =#{taskArchiveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.has_outfiedcard =#{hasOutfiedcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.has_oapublishsheet =#{hasOapublishsheet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.has_fax =#{hasFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.creation_date =#{creationDate},
t1.last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate},
t1.last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.version =t1.version+1,
t1.attribute_01 =#{attribute01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_02 =#{attribute02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_03 =#{attribute03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_04 =#{attribute04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_05 =#{attribute05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_06 =#{attribute06,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_07 =#{attribute07,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_08 =#{attribute08,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_09 =#{attribute09,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_10 =#{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
t1.attribute_11 =#{attribute11,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.attribute_12 =#{attribute12,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t1.attribute_13 =#{attribute13,jdbcType=DATE},
t1.attribute_14 =#{attribute14,jdbcType=DATE},
where t1.id = #{id} and t1.version =#{version}

mapper.select: select request_unit, count(decode(t.cur_status,1,1,null)) as curDonecount, count(decode(t.cur_status,1,null,1))-count(decode(t.cur_status,2,1,null)) as curDealingcount, count(decode(t.cur_status,2,1,null)) as curunDonecount from HDKF_SUPPORT_PROCESS_VIEW t group by t.request_unit

select sum(decode(t.cur_status,1,1,null)) as curDoneall, sum(decode(t.cur_status,1,null,1))-count(decode(t.cur_status,2,1,null)) as curDealingall, sum(decode(t.cur_status,2,1,null)) as curunDoneall from HDKF_SUPPORT_PROCESS_VIEW t

select t1.id , t1.request_id , t1.request_no , t1.cur_status , t1.cur_bpmstate , t1.cur_user , t1.request_unit , t1.batch_no , t1.model_id , t1.request_date , t1.deal_id , t1.deal_name , t1.resp_id , t1.resp_no , t1.task_id , t1.task_no , t1.borrow_info_id , t1.card_archive_id , t1.task_archive_id , t1.has_outfiedcard , t1.has_oapublishsheet , t1.has_fax , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 from hdkf_support_process_view t1
t1.cur_status!='1' and t1.cur_status!='2'
and t1.ID like '%'||#{bean.id}||'%'
and t1.REQUEST_ID like '%'||#{bean.requestId}||'%'
and t1.REQUEST_NO like '%'||#{bean.requestNo}||'%'
and t1.CUR_STATUS like '%'||#{bean.curStatus}||'%'
and t1.CUR_BPMSTATE like '%'||#{bean.curBpmstate}||'%'
and t1.CUR_USER like '%'||#{bean.curUser}||'%'
and t1.REQUEST_UNIT like '%'||#{bean.requestUnit}||'%'
and t1.BATCH_NO like '%'||#{bean.batchNo}||'%'
and t1.MODEL_ID like '%'||#{bean.modelId}||'%'
and t1.REQUEST_DATE >= #{bean.requestDateBegin}
and t1.REQUEST_DATE <= #{bean.requestDateEnd}
and t1.DEAL_ID like '%'||#{bean.dealId}||'%'
and t1.DEAL_NAME like '%'||#{bean.dealName}||'%'
and t1.RESP_ID like '%'||#{bean.respId}||'%'
and t1.RESP_NO like '%'||#{bean.respNo}||'%'
and t1.TASK_ID like '%'||#{bean.taskId}||'%'
and t1.TASK_NO like '%'||#{bean.taskNo}||'%'
and t1.BORROW_INFO_ID like '%'||#{bean.borrowInfoId}||'%'
and t1.CARD_ARCHIVE_ID like '%'||#{bean.cardArchiveId}||'%'
and t1.TASK_ARCHIVE_ID like '%'||#{bean.taskArchiveId}||'%'
and t1.HAS_OUTFIEDCARD like '%'||#{bean.hasOutfiedcard}||'%'
and t1.HAS_OAPUBLISHSHEET like '%'||#{bean.hasOapublishsheet}||'%'
and t1.HAS_FAX like '%'||#{bean.hasFax}||'%'
and t1.CREATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.createdBy}||'%'
and t1.CREATION_DATE like '%'||#{bean.creationDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateDate}||'%'
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like '%'||#{bean.lastUpdateIp}||'%'
and t1.VERSION like '%'||#{bean.version}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like '%'||#{bean.attribute01}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like '%'||#{bean.attribute02}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like '%'||#{bean.attribute03}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like '%'||#{bean.attribute04}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like '%'||#{bean.attribute05}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like '%'||#{bean.attribute06}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like '%'||#{bean.attribute07}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like '%'||#{bean.attribute08}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like '%'||#{bean.attribute09}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like '%'||#{bean.attribute10}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like '%'||#{bean.attribute11}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like '%'||#{bean.attribute12}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like '%'||#{bean.attribute13}||'%'
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like '%'||#{bean.attribute14}||'%'
and ${sfnConditions.sql}
order by t1.creation_date desc
